Quick search

Welcome to whoosh’s documentation!¶

You want blobs? Cause we got em. This engine uses a component-entity system, except entities are called blobs. This is because blob is nice to type.

class engine.blob.Blob(netid, name)[source]¶

Blob class docstring.

add_script(script)[source]¶

Adds a Script object to the blob’s list of scripts. This script will be run by the engine when certain hooks occur.

change_prop(prop_name, func)[source]¶

Alters a property using the given function. The function should take one argument (the property value) and return the changed value.

debug()[source]¶

Prints debug information about the blob.

get_name()[source]¶

Returns the name of the blob, a string.

get_network_id()[source]¶

Returns the network ID of the blob, an int.

get_prop(prop_name)[source]¶

Returns the value of the property on the blob if it exists, else None

get_velocity()[source]¶

Test

has_prop(prop_name)[source]¶

Returns True/False whether the blob has the given property.

has_tag(tag)[source]¶

Returns True/False whether the blob has the given tag.

is_key_just_pressed(key)[source]¶

Returns True/False whether the blob was not pressing the key on the previous tick, but is currently pressing it.

is_key_pressed(key, old_keys=False)[source]¶

Takes a keys constant (see engine.consts) Returns True/False whether the blob is pressing that key

post_tick()[source]¶

Called on each tick after all the blob’s scripts are run.

pre_tick()[source]¶

Called on each tick before all the blob’s scripts are run.

set_key_pressed(key, pressed=True)[source]¶

Sets the pressed state of a key.

set_prop(prop_name, prop_val)[source]¶

Sets a property on the blob with the given name and value.

tag(tag)[source]¶

Tags the blob with a descriptive tag (string).

was_key_pressed(key)[source]¶

Returns True/False whether the blob was pressing the given key on the previous tick.
